title: 3 and Out Draft Week Kickoff! Can Miss QB's -- Chiefs OL Upgrade -- Top 10 Mock Draft -- Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out Draft Week Kickoff! Can Miss QB's -- Chiefs OL Upgrade -- Top 10 Mock Draft -- Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John kicks off Draft Week by looking at why teams are so willing to move up and take risks on drafting quarterbacks with a high risk factor, why the Chiefs are being aggressive to upgrade Patrick Mahomes' protection. He also puts out his First Round Top 10 Mock Draft and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
